'use strict';
 
var _util = require('util');
 
var _models = require('../models');
 
var _models2 = _interopRequireDefault(_models);
 
function _interopRequireDefault(obj) { return obj && obj.__esModule ? obj : { default: obj }; }
 
function _defineProperty(obj, key, value) { Iif (key in obj) { Object.defineProperty(obj, key, { value: value, enumerable: true, configurable: true, writable: true }); } else { obj[key] = value; } return obj; } /**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   * User Controller
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   * handles every user related task and authentication
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   */
 
require('dotenv').config();
var bcrypt = require('bcrypt-nodejs');
var jwt = require('jsonwebtoken');
var jwtSimple = require('jwt-simple');
 
var Sequelize = require('sequelize');
 
var Op = Sequelize.Op;
 
 
var tokenFromUser = function tokenFromUser(user) {
  var timeStamp = new Date().getTime();
  return jwtSimple.encode({ sub: user.id, iat: timeStamp }, process.env.TOKEN_SECRET);
};
 
/**
 * getAllUsers - get all registered users
 *
 * @param {object} req
 * @param {object} res
 *
 * @return {object} user
 */
var getAllUsers = function getAllUsers(req, res) {
  _models2.default.User.findAll({
    order: [['id', 'DESC']]
  }).then(function (users) {
    if (users.length === 0) {
      return res.status(404).json({
        message: 'No user found in the database'
      });
    }
    return res.status(200).json({
      data: users
    });
  });
};
 
/**
 * getUsersPerPage - get users using pagination
 *
 * @param {object} req
 * @param {object} res
 *
 * @return {object} users
 */
 
var getUsersPerPage = function getUsersPerPage(req, res) {
  var limit = 5;
  var offset = 0;
  _models2.default.User.findAndCountAll().then(function (data) {
    var page = req.params.page;
 
    var isNum = isNaN(req.params.page); //eslint-disable-line 
    page = parseInt(page, 10);
    var pages = Math.ceil(data.count / limit);
    if (page <= 0 || !Number.isInteger(page) || isNum) {
      return res.status(400).json({
        message: 'Invalid page number, should start with 1'
      });
    }
    offset = limit * (page - 1);
    _models2.default.User.findAll({
      limit: limit, offset: offset, order: [['id', 'ASC']]
    }).then(function (users) {
      res.status(200).json({
        data: users,
        count: data.count,
        pages: pages
      });
    });
  }).catch(function (err) {
    return res.stauts(500).send('Internal server error');
  });
};

var createUser = function createUser(req, res) {
  var imageName = null;
  var imageUrl = null;
  req.checkBody('username', 'Username is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('username', 'Username must be between 6-25 character long').len(6, 25);
  req.checkBody('email', 'Email field is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('email', 'Invalid email address').isEmail();
  req.checkBody('password', 'Password field must not be empty').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('password', 'Password must be between 8-100 character long').len(8, 100);
  req.checkBody('firstname', 'firstname is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('lastname', 'lastname is required').notEmpty();
 
  req.sanitize('username').trim();
  req.sanitize('email').trim();

    imageUrl = req.file.path;
    imageName = req.file.originalname;
  } else {
    imageName = 'no_image.png';
    imageUrl = 'no_image_url';
  }

    if (!result.isEmpty()) {
      errors = result.array().map(function (e) {
        return e.msg;
      });
      return res.status(400).json({
        message: errors
      });

      where: _defineProperty({}, Op.or, [{ username: req.body.username }, { email: req.body.email }])
    }).then(function (user) {

            message: 'Username is already taken'
          });

          return res.status(409).json({
            message: 'Email is already taken'
          });
        }
      } else {
        _models2.default.User.create({
          username: req.body.username,
          firstname: req.body.firstname,
          lastname: req.body.lastname,
          password: hashPassword,
          email: req.body.email,
          imageUrl: imageUrl,
          imageName: imageName

              message: 'New user has been created successfully',
              data: u,
              token: tokenFromUser(u)
            });
          }
          return res.status(500).json({
            message: 'There is an internal server error'
          });
        });
      }
    });
  });
};
 
/**
 * userLogin - signin a user
 *
 * @param {object} req
 * @param {object} res
 *
 * @return {object} (token, message, user)
 */
var userLogin = function userLogin(req, res) {
  req.checkBody('username', 'Username is required').notEmpty();
  req.checkBody('password', 'Password is required').notEmpty();
  req.sanitize('username').trim();
  req.sanitize('password').trim();
  var errors = [];
  var user = {
    username: req.body.username,
    email: req.body.username,
    password: req.body.password
  };
  req.getValidationResult().then(function (result) {
    Iif (!result.isEmpty()) {
      errors = result.array().map(function (e) {
        return e.msg;
      });
      res.status(400).json({
        message: errors
      });
    } else {
      _models2.default.User.findOne({
        where: _defineProperty({}, Op.or, [{ username: req.body.username }, { email: req.body.username }])
      }).then(function (loginUser) {
        if (loginUser) {
          if (bcrypt.compareSync(user.password, loginUser.password)) {
            var token = tokenFromUser(loginUser);
            Eif (token) {
              return res.status(202).json({
                message: 'Logged in successfully',
                token: token,
                data: loginUser
              });
            }
            return res.status(401).json({
              message: 'Error creating the user token'
            });
          }
          return res.status(401).json({
            message: 'Wrong password'
          });
        }
        return res.status(404).json({
          message: 'You have no login details with us. Kindly sign up with us'
        });
      });
    }
  });
};
 
var userControllers = {
  getAllUsers: getAllUsers,
  createUser: createUser,
  userLogin: userLogin,
  getUsersPerPage: getUsersPerPage
};
 
module.exports = userControllers;
